trans-unit.target:
Hey there !
Thanks for signing up.

To complete your registration, please click the link below to verify your account :
%link%

This link is valid for %token_time_validity% hour(s). Past this time, you will need to create a new account.
You requested a new password for your account

You recently asked to reset your password.
Please click the link below to reset your password :
%link%

This link is valid for %token_time_validity% hour(s). Past this time, you will need to restart the password reset process.
If you did not ask for this change,
please ignore this email. Your account will remain safe.

Hey there !
You recently changed your email.

Your email is an important thing for us, because you use it as login.
So, please, follow the link below to verify this new email :
%link%

You must follow this link if you want to valid this new email address.
If you don't do this, the email changing request will be ignored.
